virtual int ibase::CApplicationInfoComp::GetMainVersionId ( ) const [virtual]

Get ID of main module version ID for iser::IVersionInfo.

This ID is used to identify which module is main application module. The meaning is the same as meaning of versionId parameters in interface iser::IVersionInfo.

Returns:
ID of main module, or negative value if it is undefined.

Implements ibase::IApplicationInfo.

virtual QString ibase::CApplicationInfoComp::GetVersionIdDescription ( int  versionId) const [protected, virtual]

Get description of version ID.

Parameters:
versionIdversioning type. It allows you to distinguish different version aspects. For example version number of framework cann differ from application version.
See also:
VersionId, GetVersionNumber.

virtual bool ibase::CApplicationInfoComp::GetVersionNumber ( int  versionId,
quint32 &  result 
) const [protected, virtual]

Get version of archived stream for specific versioning type.

Parameters:
versionIdversioning type. It allows you to distinguish different version aspects. For example version number of framework cann differ from application version.
See also:
VersionId.
Parameters:
resultoutput version number. For unknown version it will be set to bigg number to indicate of using the newest version.
Returns:
true, if version is known.
